text: A Dangerous Affair is a 1995 American made-for-television thriller film starring Connie Sellecca and Gregory Harrison and directed by Alan Metzger. It premiered on ABC on January 1, 1995. ==Plot== Sharon Blake is a successful career woman who meets real-estate agent Robert Kenzer while attending a party and they soon begin a passionate affair.
